response.overview: Rising from humble beginnings in Guanajuato, Mexico, Jorge Negrete went on to study opera and subsequently became the greatest &NFi;ranchera&NFi_; singer in the history of Mexican cinema, appearing in more than 40 films. This Spanish-language documentary examines his fascinating life and career, including his high-profile marriages to actresses Elisa Christy and "La Do√±a" Maria Felix, one of Mexico's most enduring leading ladies.
response.title: La Vida de Jorge Negrete
